name: David LUSICK, Petitioner v. Judge Jacquelline ALLEN, Respondent

parties: David LUSICK, Petitioner v. Judge Jacquelline ALLEN, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of July, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and the Application Seeking Leave to Supplement are DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
48 A.3d 1245
David LUSICK, Petitioner v. Judge Jacquelline ALLEN, Respondent.
No. 77 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 19, 2012.
